GR13gorst2pu:6: vyaktāvyakta-guṇādhikaṃ tam aniśaṃ śrī-mīnanāthaṃ bhaje // GorS(2)_2 //
GR13gorst2pu:7: namaskṛtya guruṃ bhaktyā gorakṣo jñānam uttamam /
GR13gorst2pu:10: dhruvaṃ yasyāvabodhena jāyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_4 //
GR13gorst2pu:12: yad vyāvṛttaṃ mano mohād āsaktaṃ paramātmani // GorS(2)_5 (=1|2) //
GR13gorst2pu:14: śamanaṃ bhava-tāpasya yogaṃ bhajati sajjanaḥ // GorS(2)_6 (=1|3) //
GR13gorst2pu:16: dhyānaṃ samādhir etāni yogāṅgāni bhavanti ṣaṭ // GorS(2)_7 (=1|4) //
GR13gorst2pu:18: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ // GorS(2)_8 (=1|5) //
GR13gorst2pu:20: tataḥ śivena pīṭhānāṃ ṣoḍeśānaṃ śataṃ kṛtam // GorS(2)_9 (=1|6) //
GR13gorst2pu:22: ekaṃ siddhāsanaṃ proktaṃ dvitīyaṃ kamalāsanam // GorS(2)_10 (=1|7) //
GR13gorst2pu:23: yoni-sthānakam aṅghri-mūla-ghaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyasen meḍhre pādam athaikam eva niyataṃ kṛtvā samaṃ vigraham /
GR13gorst2pu:24: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamitendriyo'cala-dṛśā paśyan bhruvor antaram etan
GR13gorst2pu:26: vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathā dakṣorūpari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ dṛḍham /
GR13gorst2pu:27: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ nāsāgram ālokayed etad-vyādhi-vikāra-hāri
GR13gorst2pu:30: sva-dehe ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_13 //
GR13gorst2pu:32: sva-dehaṃ ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_14 //
GR13gorst2pu:33: caturdalaṃ syād ādhāraḥ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ṣaṭ-dalam /
GR13gorst2pu:34: nābhau daśa-dalaṃ padmaṃ sūrya-saṅkhya-dalaṃ hṛdi // GorS(2)_15 //
GR13gorst2pu:35: kaṇṭhe syāt ṣoḍaśa-dalaṃ bhrū-madhye dvidalaṃ tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:38: yoni-sthānaṃ dvayor madhye kāma-rūpaṃ nigadyate // GorS(2)_17 (=1|10) //
GR13gorst2pu:40: tan-madhye procyate yoniḥ kāmākṣā siddha-vanditā // GorS(2)_18 (=1|11) //
GR13gorst2pu:42: mastake maṇivad bimbaṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_19 (=1|12) //
GR13gorst2pu:44: trikoṇaṃ tat-puraṃ vahner adho-meḍhrāt pratiṣṭhitam // GorS(2)_20 (=1|13)
GR13gorst2pu:45: yat samādhau paraṃ jyotir anantaṃ viśvato-mukham /
GR13gorst2pu:46: tasmin dṛṣṭe mahā-yoge yātāyātaṃ na vidyate // GorS(2)_21 //
GR13gorst2pu:48: svādhiṣṭhānāt padād asmān meḍhram evābhidhīyate // GorS(2)_22 (=1|14) //
GR13gorst2pu:49: tantunā maṇivat proto yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā /
GR13gorst2pu:52: tāvaj jīvo bhramaty eva yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati // GorS(2)_24 //
GR13gorst2pu:53: ūrdhvaṃ meḍhrād adho nābheḥ kanda-yoniḥ khagāṇḍavat /
GR13gorst2pu:54: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇāṃ dvisaptatiḥ // GorS(2)_25 (=1|16) //
GR13gorst2pu:56: pradhānaṃ prāṇa-vāhinyo bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ // GorS(2)_26 (=1|17) //
GR13gorst2pu:57: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
GR13gorst2pu:58: gāndhārī hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśasvinī // GorS(2)_27 (=1|18) //
GR13gorst2pu:59: alambuṣā kuhūś caiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā /
GR13gorst2pu:60: etan nāḍi-mayaṃ cakraṃ jñātavyaṃ yogibhiḥ sadā // GorS(2)_28 (=1|19) //
GR13gorst2pu:61: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:62: suṣumṇā madhya-deśe tu gāndhārī vāma-cakṣuṣi // GorS(2)_29 (=1|20) //
GR13gorst2pu:63: dakṣiṇe hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe /
GR13gorst2pu:64: yaśasvinī vāma-karṇe cāsane vāpy alambuṣā // GorS(2)_30 (=1|21) //
GR13gorst2pu:65: kuhūś ca liṅga-deśe tu mūla-sthāne ca śaṅkhinī /
GR13gorst2pu:66: evaṃ dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa-nāḍikāḥ // GorS(2)_31 (=1|22) //
GR13gorst2pu:69: prāṇo'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyānau ca vāyavaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:70: nāgaḥ kūrmo'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GorS(2)_33 (=1|24) //
GR13gorst2pu:71: hṛdi prāṇo vasen nityaṃ apāno guda-maṇḍale /
GR13gorst2pu:72: samāno nābhi-deśe syād udānaḥ kaṇṭha-madhyagaḥ // GorS(2)_34 //
GR13gorst2pu:74: kṛkaraḥ kṣuta-kṛj jñeyo devadatto vijṛmbhaṇe // GorS(2)_35 //
GR13gorst2pu:75: na jahāti mṛtaṃ cāpi sarva-vyāpi dhanañjayaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:76: ete sarvāsu nāḍīṣu bhramante jīva-rūpiṇaḥ // GorS(2)_36 (=1|25) //
GR13gorst2pu:78: prāṇāpāna-samākṣiptas tathā jīvo na tiṣṭhati // GorS(2)_38 (=1|27) //
GR13gorst2pu:79: prāṇāpāna-vaśo jīvo hy adhaś cordhvaṃ ca dhāvati /
GR13gorst2pu:82: guṇa-baddhas tathā jīvaḥ prāṇāpānena kṛṣyate // GorS(2)_40 (=1|28) //
GR13gorst2pu:83: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇo'pānaṃ ca karṣati /
GR13gorst2pu:84: ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitāv etau saṃyojayati yogavit // GorS(2)_41 (=1|29) //
GR13gorst2pu:85: ha-kāreṇa bahir yāti sa-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:86: haṃsa-haṃsety amuṃ mantraṃ jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_42 //
GR13gorst2pu:88: etat saṅkhyānvitaṃ mantra jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_43 //
GR13gorst2pu:91: anayā sadṛśī vidyā anayā sadṛśo japaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:92: anayā sadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // GorS(2)_45 //
GR13gorst2pu:94: prāṇa-vidyā mahā-vidyā yas tāṃ vetti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_46 //
GR13gorst2pu:100: sūcīvad guṇam ādāya vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_49 (=1|31) //
GR13gorst2pu:102: prabuddhā vahni-yogena vratya ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_50 //
GR13gorst2pu:103: udghaṭayet kapātaṃ tu yathā kuñcikayā haṭhāt /
GR13gorst2pu:104: kuṇḍalinyā tathā yogī mokṣa-dvāraṃ prabhedayet // GorS(2)_51 //
GR13gorst2pu:105: kṛtvā sampuṭitau karau dṛḍhataraṃ baddhvā tu padmāsanaṃ gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi sannidhāya cibukaṃ dhyātvā ca tat prekṣitam /
GR13gorst2pu:106: vāraṃ vāram apānam ūrdhvam anilaṃ proccārayet pūritaṃ muñcan prāṇam upaiti bodham atulaṃ śakti-prabodhān naraḥ // GorS(2)_52 (=HYP 1.50) //
GR13gorst2pu:110: abdād ūrdhvaṃ bhavet siddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GorS(2)_54 (=HYP 1.59)
GR13gorst2pu:112: bhujyate sura-samprītyai mitāhāraḥ sa ucyate // GorS(2)_55 (=HYP 1.60) //
GR13gorst2pu:114: bandhanāya ca mūḍhānāṃ yogināṃ mokṣadā smṛtā // GorS(2)_56 (=HYP 3.107) //
GR13gorst2pu:116: mūla-bandhaṃ ca yo vetti sa yogī siddhi-bhājanam // GorS(2)_57 (=1|32) //
GR13gorst2pu:119: vakṣo-nyasta-hanur nipīḍya suciraṃ yoniṃ ca vāmāṅghriṇā hastābhyām
GR13gorst2pu:121: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi-yugalaṃ baddhvā śanai recayed eṣā pātaka-nāśinī
GR13gorst2pu:124: yāvat tulyā bhavet saṅkhyā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet // GorS(2)_60 (=HYP
GR13gorst2pu:125: na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve'pi nīrasāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:126: api muktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam api jīryate // GorS(2)_61 (=HYP 3.16) //
GR13gorst2pu:128: tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo'bhyaset // GorS(2)_62 (=HYP
GR13gorst2pu:130: gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit // GorS(2)_63 (=HYP 3.18) //
GR13gorst2pu:132: bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī // GorS(2)_64 (=1|34) //
GR13gorst2pu:133: na rogo maraṇaṃ tandrā na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā /
GR13gorst2pu:134: na ca mūrcchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_65 (=HYP
GR13gorst2pu:135: pīḍyate na sa rogeṇa lipyate na ca karmaṇā /
GR13gorst2pu:136: bādhyate na sa kālena yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_66 (=HYP 3.40)
GR13gorst2pu:137: cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā /
GR13gorst2pu:138: tenaiṣā khecarī nāma mudrā siddhair nirūpitā // GorS(2)_67 (=HYP 3.41) //
GR13gorst2pu:139: bindu-mūlaṃ śarīraṃ tu śirās tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:142: na tasya kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāliṅgitasya ca // GorS(2)_69 //
GR13gorst2pu:143: yāvad binduḥ sthito dehe tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:144: yāvad baddhā nabho-mudrā tāvad bindur na gacchati // GorS(2)_70 //
GR13gorst2pu:145: calito'pi yadā binduḥ samprāptaś ca hutāśanam /
GR13gorst2pu:146: vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ hṛtaḥ śaktyā niruddho yoni-mudrayā // GorS(2)_71 (=HYP
GR13gorst2pu:147: sa punar dvividho binduḥ paṇḍuro lohitas tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:148: pāṇḍuraṃ śukram ity āhur lohitaṃ tu mahārājaḥ // GorS(2)_72 //
GR13gorst2pu:150: śaśi-sthāne sthito bindus tayor aikyaṃ sudurlabham // GorS(2)_73 //
GR13gorst2pu:151: binduḥ śivo rajaḥ śaktir bindum indū rajo raviḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:152: ubhayoḥ saṅgamād eva prāpyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_74 //
GR13gorst2pu:154: bindunaiti sahaikatvaṃ bhaved divyaṃ vapus tadā // GorS(2)_75 //
GR13gorst2pu:155: śukraṃ candreṇa saṃyuktaṃ rajaḥ sūryeṇa saṃyutam /
GR13gorst2pu:156: tayoḥ samarasaikatvaṃ yojānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_76 //
GR13gorst2pu:158: uḍḍīyānaṃ tad eva syāt tava bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_77 (=HYP 3.56) //
GR13gorst2pu:159: udarāt paścime bhāge hy adho nābher nigadyate /
GR13gorst2pu:160: uḍḍīyanasya bandho'yaṃ tatra bandho vidhīyate // GorS(2)_78 //
GR13gorst2pu:164: pīyūṣaṃ na pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati // GorS(2)_80 (=1|36, HYP
GR13gorst2pu:166: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūla-bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_81 (=1|37, HYP
GR13gorst2pu:168: yuvā bhavati vṛddho'pi satataṃ mūla-bandhanāt // GorS(2)_82 (=1|38, HYP
GR13gorst2pu:170: nāsāgra-dṛṣṭir ekānte japed oṅkāram avyayam // GorS(2)_83 //
GR13gorst2pu:171: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ime lokāḥ soma-sūryāgni-devatāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:172: yasyā mātrāsu tiṣṭhanti tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_84 //
GR13gorst2pu:173: trayaḥ kālās trayo vedās trayo lokās trayaḥ sverāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:174: trayo devāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_85 //
GR13gorst2pu:175: kriyā cecchā tathā jñānā brāhmī raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī /
GR13gorst2pu:176: tridhā śaktiḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_86 //
GR13gorst2pu:178: tisro mātrāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_87 //
GR13gorst2pu:179: vacasā taj jayed bījaṃ vapuṣā tat samabhyaset /
GR13gorst2pu:180: manasā tat smaren nityaṃ tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_88 //
GR13gorst2pu:181: śucir vāpy aśucir vāpi yo japet praṇavaṃ sadā /
GR13gorst2pu:182: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā // GorS(2)_89 //
GR13gorst2pu:183: cale vāte calo bindur niścale niścalo bhavet /
GR13gorst2pu:184: yogī sthāṇutvam āpnoti tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_90 (=1|39, HYP
GR13gorst2pu:185: yāvad vāyuḥ sthito dehe tāvaj jīvanam ucyate /
GR13gorst2pu:186: maraṇaṃ tasya niṣkrāntis tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_91 (=HYP 2.3) //
GR13gorst2pu:187: yāvad baddho marud dehe yāvac cittaṃ nirākulam /
GR13gorst2pu:188: yāvad dṛṣṭir bhruvor madhye tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ // GorS(2)_92 (=HYP
GR13gorst2pu:190: yogino munayaś caiva tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_93 //
GR13gorst2pu:193: śuddhim eti yadā sarvaṃ nāḍī-cakraṃ malākulam /
GR13gorst2pu:194: tadaiva jāyate yogī prāṇa-saṃgrahaṇe kṣamaḥ // GorS(2)_95 //
GR13gorst2pu:196: dhārayitvā yathā-śakti bhūyaḥ sūryeṇa recayet // GorS(2)_96 (=1|43) //
GR13gorst2pu:198: dhyātvā candramaso bimbaṃ prāṇāyāmī sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_97 (=1|44) //
GR13gorst2pu:199: dakṣiṇo śvāsam ākṛṣya pūrayed udaraṃ śanaiḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:200: kumbhayitvā vidhānena puraś candreṇa recayet // GorS(2)_98 (=1|45) //
GR13gorst2pu:202: dhyātvā nābhi-sthitaṃ yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_99 (=1|46) //
GR13gorst2pu:203: prāṇaṃ codiḍayā piben parimitaṃ bhūyo'nyayā recayet pītvā piṅgalayā
GR13gorst2pu:205: sūrya-candramasor anena vidhinā bimba-dvayaṃ dhyāyataḥ śuddhā nāḍi-gaṇā
